author: abhishek shukla
comment: All and all I am happy with the flipkart and the experience till the time is really satisfactory.  1) The presentation of the product is good either it's through the images uploaded on the site or the description for the product. 2) the team is really working on the feedbacks and from time to time they will come up with something new like flipkart pay later option is quite cool as of now.  Keep the good work going 👍👍

flipkart app truly gives an awesome shopping experience.. however,i think flipkart should work on its business model where shipping cost is often seemingly unjustified.. it's better if listing includes shipping cost so that i can sort products according to the final all inclusive cost that i pay for

author: Jonathan
comment: Not good Doesn't provide Cod on latest phone. And do auto cancellation. We are not fools that we will do online payment for the product that is going to be cancelled within seconds or after shipment. Worst online shopping site

author: sanket sabal
comment: Worst ever experience of flash sale.. they canceled my orders about 3-4 times. They are just playing with our feeling. I want to gift it to my mother on her birthday and these stupid things are happening.   No COD on Redmi Note 5 pro.....! are you jocking....? What do you want...? Should I pay an amount of about 14000 and if there is any problem in that product, will you return that amount as fast as we paid...? Well I don't think so... Why should I give you my whole salary of a month for 2 days... Are you..

author: Ashwani Kumar
comment: Very bad customer service. I didn't sign in from 18th Feb in Flipkart account.  And from that date I contacted with customer care continuously via call or mail also but the issue is not resolved yet.  They repeat again and again "sir wait for 24 hours or 72 hours our back-end team will contact you and sent an email to you.  But till today I didn't receive any mail or call from Flipkart team.

author: Neelam Gupta
comment: The app d not good as I am unable to change my number and email from the website. This app has the worst help center I have ever seen. But it is good for shopping purpose.

author: 7thSon Mizo
comment: I'm rating down this due to cancellation of orders even after shipping.   When speaking to the customer care, we receive a response to made a new order of the same item..ooohmy..G... what on earth..! Everyone knew the difficulty of booking flash sales..and not every sales include bank offers and cash backs..  Dear flipkart...you really need to review this types of problems.  THIS IS A BIG LOST OF MONEY AND TIME for regular customers like us

author: adnan hussain
comment: Cant log in to account i had to deactivate and then when i tried to activate it again it says contact us . When i try to contact you it wants me to login but i cant because i have to reactivate my account , and also i used my other phone number to recover password but it just says try again later.. a little help would b appreciated as i am staying in Oman its the onpy way to get a smile on a loved ones face 😊 thank you

author: Akhil Nainala
comment: No COD Very terrible..  How people can serve money instantly.  Every middlemen can't do like this.. So no phone can be ordered like us people. It will demotivated flipkart.  So we will reduce using flipkart..  Product is cancelled after shipping Cancelling after ordering  Automatic cancel from seller side..  All this are not correct.. * *I think amazon is providing correct service..*

author: TECHNICAL ZONE
comment: 1 Start rating for auto cancellation this so sad. And doesn't provide cod on letest phone. This is really so sad for flipkart customers. This will also be a big push for the company.

author: Dr.makarand kulkarni
comment: Service is exceptionally pathetic.They send you wrong product, auto cancel your return or replacement request, customer care waste too much time so that you finally get frustrated and let your money go. You are not going to trust me, right? Then go and screw yourself. Then you will know.

author: BOHEMIANS
comment: Worst App Ever. Doesn't provide COD services for the latest mobile phones. We are not fools that we'll be waiting for the product that will be cancelled after shipment also. Worst App Ever.

author: Anand Puthiya Veettil
comment: The worst app. Auto canceling the phone that we booked. Doesn't giving cod for latest phones. We are not fools to pay online for auto canceling smartphones.....
This app is rubbish..... I bought black coloured headphones worth Rs1599 but they delivered me a purple coloured headphone... It seems to be only 100 Rs     They cheated me

author: kishan jagwani
comment: 4 weak se flash sale me mobile order karne ki try kar Raha bt order ho Jane ke baad cancel kardete ho jab cancel hi karna hota to flash sale kyu late ho and stock me nahi hai to site par show kyu karte hai 😑

author: aayush agarwal
comment: Worst site. My order was automatically cancelled after shipping. When i called flipkart executive they are blaming courier companies.

author: kamal taneja
comment: Making fool to people, 2 times i have ordered everytime flipkart cancelled my order,when i called to  flp cust care they asked we are having stock of that item. If dont have in stock so why r u showing it in stock and placing order.

On Last sale I ordered note 5 pro phone in my address after shipping it's cancelled  Booked 3 from 3 accounts  3 of them cancelled after shipping  And also on the destination city RTO problem  Worst app ever

reply.author: Flipkart
reply.content: Truly sorry to hear that. Please let us know the details of your issue so that we can assist you in the best possible way: https://www.flipkart.com/s/contact

author: ABHISHEK TIWARI
comment: Flipkart is best e-commerce company. It now starts shipping products in my region. It is one of the most trusted company along with Amazon it ships the products as per samples. I really happy to use this app due to nice interface and many other things.

author: Sanam Afroz
comment: A bit costly with the delivery charges..and stock of latest esition of books is lacking in many educational sections. Love the FPL feature unique one. One Advice from a loyal customer,The Stock is a bit lacking.

author: Gaurav Solanki
comment: For shopping get this app.u have told if u download this app u will get 150 rupees discount. But I didn't get any discount and I have pay extra 100 rupees delivery chargess. Filpkart done cheating.

reply.author: Flipkart
reply.content:
Request you to share brief query of the issue you are facing. Please write to us on 
app-feedback@flipkart.com with your registered email-id to serve you better.

author: Dipankar Roy
comment: Flipkart lost their way. Money making is the only Moto. Fake discount promotion. Fake pricing on many products. Just look at yourself and compare with other online services like Amazon. Normal household products and their prices, disgusting.

author: kids carton funny
comment: Mi note 5 kabhi book hoga bhi ya nahi jab bhi book Karne jayo to out of stock batata h sutiya bana Raha h flipcart Wala I hate this app

reply.author: Flipkart
reply.content: Hi, we hear you. As this is a popular item, we're sure it'll be available with our sellers soon. Stay tuned for updates!

author: Ranvir Singh
comment: Here are some fraud sellers like satpalgarments ludhiana,  i purchase a wax packing 75gms and paid also as per rate of 75gms,  but seller send me only 1 piece of 25gms,,  this is fraud,,  flipkart needs to see these kinds of fraud sellers

author: Minal Gaikwad
comment: They Cancelled my ordered and informed it after 3 4 days later.. disappointed Flipkart !   Hopefully this doesn't happens again.
I use Flipkart app for booking redmi phones by cod but now present time there have no cod in specially mi note 5 pro. So I'm not satisfy about that in present time.

author: DHARMA PRODUCTION
comment: It's good. All type of things we can buy from here, home delivery service is Okk but sometimes  the home delivery of some areas is not possible so that is the problem.   Otherwise the tracking and delivery services good.  You don't get any damage and take only fix charges as shown in profile. Don't include other charges.  If the delivery service is provided in all areas that it is the best.

author: ARIF ARIF
comment: Worst online shopping experience from flipkart,my first order of Redmi note 5 pro Goes RTO😑 which is i got  luck,now No COD for next flash sale,Amazon is far better when comes to flash sale

author: A.N.J media
comment: Worst app. After place order automatically cancel .No cod in flash sales. very poor service.

author: Prince Patel
comment: On a good doesn't provide cod on lestest phone.and do auto canceltion.we are not fools that we will do online payment for the product that is going to be cancelled with in seconds of after shipement worst decision made by filpkart.its foolish decision

author: Rishabh Raj Rishu
comment: Flipkart cancellation and rto rule is worst rule  1⃣ Rto policy 2⃣ Cancellation after shipping 3⃣ Cancelled within 5 second 4⃣ Now No COD available

author: TECH TALKS
comment: The cancelled my order every time m trying to order Redmi 5 pro but fails every time but this time the don't give cash on deleivery on Redmi note 5 pro so it's a worth experience

author: Vikas Kumar
comment: Poor people making poor app and adopting poor methodology by tricking people in the name of flash sale.Definetly the company sales will go down as a lot number people are hating the company and.moving towards amazon and other better options.

author: Mahendra Kuldeep
comment: In last sale I want to buy 5 pro but i can't order & in next sale the case on delivery option is not available so i'll be not able to purchase this product..

author: kapil singh
comment: *Flipkart cancellation and rto rule is worst rule*  1⃣ Rto policy 2⃣ Cancellation after shipping 3⃣ Cancelled within 5 second 4⃣ Now No COD available

author: Ananda Gowda N
comment: Very bad shopping experience. I did shopping in clothing. As I found it's not fitting me, I tried to return. When I connected to customer care I found that I can't return. Such a junk. Better not to purchase here.

reply.author: Flipkart
reply.content: Truly sorry to hear that, Ananda. Please write to us at cs@flipkart.com so that we can help.

author: Shobhit Chauhan
comment: i don't like the service from past few days...now COD is also stoped and the auto cancellation of product also sucks..the worst online shoping site in past few months...

author: love Arora
comment: PEHLI BAR 5A MANGWANE KI SOCH RHA THA ONLINE FLAS SE BOOK HO GYA BAAD MEIN CANCEL PRODUCT HO GYA...REASON AYA APNE KHUD CANCEL BEKAR APP...AMAZON IS BEST

author: Pruthvesh Gavali
comment: When you ordered via COD . Product get autocancelled . And when you call customer care they give rubbish answers ..worst service ever ..

reply.author: Flipkart
reply.content: Hi Pruthvesh, please share the details of your issue by clicking on the given link https://www.flipkart.com/s/contact, so that we can look into it & assist you in the best possible way.

author: Adityapal Upadhyay
comment: nice shopping experience. but flipkart must take care that some dealer can harm its image by provide faulty or wrong model  intentionally.
